comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: I can confirm that blatchcorn is connected to a huge farm of scam accounts that are promoting 1xbit. I am going to do some more digging, but this thread has some few insights ---> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5371472Waiting for his response as to why he's connected to the scam promoters.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on May 26, 2022, 07:48:55 PMQuote from: posi on May 25, 2022, 11:36:25 PMDon't expect answer from him. No answer will come, actually,He was online today but didn't show up, so I tagged the accounts. I doubt if he can every try to any claims against the evidence available.It's a ring of many accounts, and most of them are old. Probably stolen or bought.Some accounts were connected by Avirunes in 2019Many of the accounts in 1xbit campaigns were already tagged as alt accounts and cheaters. 1xbit_official is aware of this since they have been warned multiple times. Despite this, they still accepted these members into their campaigns. Clearly, it doesn't make sense for a company to pay members who are cheating in their campaigns, so it is reasonable to assume they are related in some way to these accounts. Perhaps they even bought those accounts for shilling, or perhaps they hired someone to do this for them. That guy Erdogan even admitted to running a bumping service and promoting scams on the forum before.Quote from: Erdogan on February 28, 2019, 12:01:31 AMGuys from Kepler bought from me bumping service - check first 200 pages of ann thread and bounty.Even after collecting over 1M USD they don't want pay.

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: They're all being tagged, so I don't see why they should feel relevant on the reputation board. I believe the campaign has already ended,( saw something like that on the thread) and the campaign manager doesn't care about the reputation of the accounts involved as long as you're spamming their signature across the forum.Telling them what to do when they already know what to do is also ineffective; simply add them to your ignore list and pay less attention to them. Don't feed the trolls; the best way to get rid of them is to ignore them.
